title: Turn your iPhone into a scanner with $10 off the iScanner app
content:
Macworld

We may live in a digital world, but there’s still plenty of paper to manage. The iScanner app turns your iPhone or iPad into a powerful scanning and document control tool, and now through October 15th, you can get it for an excellent price.

Rated 4.8 out of five stars on the App Store, iScanner uses your phone’s camera to snap a document, complete with templates for common documents like IDs. It then uses AI to tweak the image until the scan is as close to perfect as possible, freeing you to sign, mark up, edit, and otherwise revise. Export to PDF, Word, Excel, and other popular destinations, while merging scans, collating, adding page numbers, and other edits right in the app. iScanner even handles daily tasks like measurement, counting, and reading QR codes

Add a lifetime subscription to the iScanner App to your device for $29.97, off the $39.99 MSRP with coupon code SCANNER, a price only available now through the end of October 15th!

Prices subject to change.

Accessories
